title: Demi Vollering Completes Long-Rumored Transfer to FDJ-Suez: ‘I’m Convinced That Great Things Await Us’
content:
2023 Tour de France Femmes champion chasing second victory plus other top targets with French team.

Read the full article at Demi Vollering Completes Long-Rumored Transfer to FDJ-Suez: ‘I’m Convinced That Great Things Await Us’ on Velo.
author: sstokes
